entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 01:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
